name: raptor-modules
description: Provides support for the CommonJS module system and other module systems

scripts.test: node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./test && node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./transport/test && node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./client/test && node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./optimizer/test && node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./resolver/test && node_modules/.bin/mocha --ui bdd --reporter spec ./util/test

author: Patrick Steele-Idem <pnidem@gmail.com>
